description.p: Display server and network alerts from servers running Prometheus, Nagios, Icinga or Zabbix.
Prometheus v0.16.0+, Nagios Core 4.x and Icinga 2.12.0+ are supported with Basic Authentication; and default authentication for Zabbix 6.x or 7.x.

screenshot.caption: Display service errors and down servers on your network
Connect to a compatible network monitor
Enable notifications and dark mode in the app settings
Filter out visible alerts by type

description.p: Support for Zabbix 6 and 7 was added, along with per-source visibility and notification switches. This version also adds a details screen opened by tapping on alerts, and a helpful messages if a new alert source isn't discovered. Support and donation links were updated. Flutter and Dart dependencies were upgraded, and various application fixes were made.
Switched JSON parsing to use '@freezed', added an explicit summary of dependency licenses, and updated Flutter dependencies
Update alerts w/o fetch when filters change, improvements to automation and packaging for Linux
Don't overwrite x86_64 .deb file with aarch64 build
Compile .deb packages for Ubuntu derivatives, update Flatpak metadata to meet more quality guidelines
Updated app descriptions, and trademark disclaimer. Added old changelog summaries
Changed color of "unknown" alert, fixed issue with notification sound on Linux. Testing out Linux aarch64 builds, and summarizing commit log entries
Correction to tagged release build script
Add necessary metadata to support building a Flatpak version, upgrade OS packages before automated build
Set up builds of Linux bundles, to be used for making Flatpaks
